pages.text: $(italic)You'd almost think this enchantment breathes a little bit of life into your tools.$(br2)Like a living creature, the tool gradually gets used to the block you are mining and specializes in it. In return, however, the mining of other blocks becomes slower.
$(br3)Decreased mining speed. Speed increases with each block mined of the same type.$(br2)Max Level: 3$(br)Applicable to mining tools.
